Test.Name: DP MST Modeset With Clone Config
Test.CommandLine: python Tests\Display_Port\ManualTests\dp_mst_manual_config.py -Display1 "eDP" -Display2 "Display USB-C => DP 1.2 (Depth 1)" -Display3 "Display DP 1.2 (Depth 2)" -Display4 "Display DP 1.2 (Depth 3)" -config CLONE -depth 3 -all_ports True

Test.Name: DP MST Modeset With Extended config
Test.CommandLine: python Tests\Display_Port\ManualTests\dp_mst_manual_config.py -Display1 "eDP" -Display2 "Display DP 1.2 (Depth 1)" -Display3 "Display DP 1.2 (Depth 2)" -Display4 "Display DP 1.2 (Depth 3)" -config EXTENDED -depth 3 -all_ports True
